member.name: M:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncer.SyncFolder(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Action{SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncEvents,System.String})
member.summary: Synchronize a local folder with a remote folder.
member.param: The local source folder. Multiple folders can be specified separated by a ';'
The name of the remote folder
If true, the newly synched folder will be used when updated
An optional callback used to display what's going on

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncerParams.Server
member.summary: Server address

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncerParams.IgnoreCertErrors
member.summary: If true, any bad server certificates are accepted.. NOT RECOMMENDED!

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncerParams.MaxConcurrency
member.summary: The maximum concurrency to use, zero or negative is based on the number of hardware threads

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncerParams.Comment
member.summary: An optional comment

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncEvents.Hashed
member.summary: Called when a hash of a local file have been computed

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncEvents.Scanned
member.summary: Files on the source disc have been scanned

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncEvents.Checked
member.summary: Files have been checked against remote server

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncEvents.Uploaded
member.summary: Called when a file have been uploaded

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncFile.Name
member.summary: Name of the file (locally within the source folder)

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncFile.Hash
member.summary: The MD5 checksum of the file content, encoded using hex values, "abcd...", where a = is the high nibble of the first byte, b is the low nibble of the first byte and so on...

member.name: F:SysWeaver.FolderSync.FolderSyncFile.LastModified
member.summary: Numer of milliseconds since the Unix epoch

member.summary: The folder

member.summary: The files

member.summary: If true, the newly synched folder will be activated directly

member.summary: The source machine name

member.summary: An optional comment

member.summary: The folder

member.summary: The name of the folder on disc

member.summary: The folder
